description: A room definition derived from CSV characteristics.
title: RoomDefinition

Level.description: The desired level on which to place the room.

Group.description: The group in which to place the room.

Length.description: The desired length of the room.

Width.description: The desired width of the room.

Area.description: The desired area of the room.

Ratio.description: The desired ratio of length to width when defining a room by area.

Order.description: The desired placement order of the room.
